channel.title: Attack emote (still not fixed)
channel.description:
just recently my mate logged onto my server and found that the lime whip wasnt hitting like a normal whip. i did try and add the normal whip animation when hitting but nothing happen.
could someone please help me? thank you

item.title: Attack emote (still not fixed)
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:17, topic:523049”][quote author=u loose link=topic=641544.msg4322025#msg4322025 date=1372340738]

post a video of the issue please it’s hard to decipher then what the issue is without seeing it.

as im on my phone atm i cant.

but when you hit with a normal whip, it like flicks back, but with lime whip it just lifts the hand and the hits.
[/quote]I guess it’s possible your whip isn’t fully animated with the newer/older version?[/quote]

my normal whip hits fine, everything with it is fine.

this is my combatass

case 11207: //limewhip case 4151: // whip if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(341); } c.specAccuracy = 1.20; c.specDamage = 1.18; c.startAnimation(1658); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Attack emote (still not fixed)
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:523049”]Here’s a good trick with cases:

case 11207://Lime whip case 4151: // whip if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(341); } c.specAccuracy = 1.20; c.specDamage = 1.18; c.startAnimation(1658); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break; [/quote]

oh that looks a lot cleaner.
than having lime and whip 2 ones.

edit: still doesnt work

Read full topic

item.title: Attack emote (still not fixed)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Here’s a good trick with cases:

case 11207://Lime whip
case 4151: // whip
                        if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
                                Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(341);
                        }
                        c.specAccuracy = 1.20;
                        c.specDamage = 1.18;
                        c.startAnimation(1658);
                        c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
                        break;

Read full topic

item.title: Attack emote (still not fixed)
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:523049”][quote author=u loose link=topic=641544.msg4321925#msg4321925 date=1372319542]
just recently my mate logged onto my server and found that the lime whip wasnt hitting like a normal whip.
i did try and add the normal whip animation when hitting but nothing happen.

could someone please help me?
thank you
[/quote]
Find how the normal whip is added and add the lime one the same way?[/quote]

i did that and it was the same as you can see.
i just took away the spec due to the lime not having a spec.

		[code]case 4151: // whip
		if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
			Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(341);
		}
		c.specAccuracy = 1.20;
		c.specDamage = 1.18;
		c.startAnimation(1658);
		c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
		break;

		case 11207: // lime whip
		if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
			Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(341);
		}
		c.startAnimation(1658);
		c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
		break;[/code]

Read full topic
